description: This defines a car simulator that can execute a full charging session, from plugging in to plugging out. It uses HIL or SIL simulation controllers from e.g. the Yeti HIL simulator.

enable.description: Sets the ID that uniquely identifies the EVSE. The EVSEID shall match the following structure: <EVSEID> = <Country Code> <S> <EVSE Operator ID> <S> <ID Type> <Power Outlet ID>

enabled.description: Indicates whether simulation is currently enabled or not
